content.rendered:
Directed by Domini Hofmann. Domini Hofmann.

Cast Susan Miller( Self – Alex’s Mom). Arleen Hairbaedian( Self – Jamison’s Roommate). Peter Cernauskas( Self – Arleen’s Former Landlord). Sonia Acevedo( Self – Jamison’s Roommate). Bob B.( Self – Jamison’s Childhood Friend). John Cabrera( Self – Sacramento Police Department (Ret.)). Callie Quinn( Self – Youssef’s Roommate). Molly Parsons( Self – Youssef’s Roommate). Joey Ramirez( Self – Orange Police Department (Ret.)). Judy Moises( Self – Social Worker (Ret.), Volunteers of America). William P. Wood( Self – Deputy District Attorney (Ret.]). Scott Simmons( Self – Senior Deputy D.A., Orange County (Ret.)). Maher Khatib( Self – Coordinator, Palestinian Network in Denmark.). Shawn Haydon( Self – Orange Police Department). Bill Clausen( Self – Ruth Monroe’s Son). Carlos Medina( Self – Palestinian Community Leader in Chile). Dominic Rayner( Self – Ultramarathon Runner). Lucy Gonzalez Ramos( Self – Maribel’s Sister). Rocio Berrios IbÃ¡Ã±ez( Self – Callie’s Attorney). Giselle Cendejas( Self – Lucero’s Daughter). Bob Friedman( Self – Jamison’s Childhood Friend). James F. McGowan( Self – Montgomery County Detective Bureau)

Language English.

Producers Cristina Bishai. Jason Blum. William Brennan. Grace Douglas. Natalia Henderson. Domini Hofmann. Mary Lisio. Chris McCumber. Cristin Ray. Jennifer Schwartz. Jeremy Gold. Ruth Hanby. Shannon Pence. Jonathan Ruane. Josh Herring. Jonathon Ruane. Grayson Brooke.

Production Blumhouse Productions. Blumhouse Television. Chris Morgan Productions.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 5

Sta7.0tus Finished (2022–2022)
